channel.title: unix on Satya Pavan's Serverless Soul

item.title: Difference between exit() and _exit()
item.description: The functions, exit() and _exit() serve the same master, but have different motives.

item.title: Fork bomb
item.description: A fork bomb works by creating a large number of processes very quickly in order to saturate the available space in the list of processes kept by the computerâ€™s operating system.
